Temporarily holds the integrity of Parrot IM user's buddylist model.

JList usersBannedBuddyList
Temporarily holds the integrity of blocked Parrot IM user's buddylist model.

Temporarily holds the integrity of Parrot IM user's buddylist in ArrayList.

Temporarily holds the integrity of blocked Parrot IM user's buddylist in ArrayList.

Package view.chatLog

Class view.chatLog.BuddyPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

buddyList

JList buddyList
buddyList is a JList object. It is the left component of ChatLogPanel. buddyList shows the list of buddies whom the user has talked to.

Class view.chatLog.ChatLogFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

model

Model model
model allows the ChatLogFrame to store the state of ChatLogFrame (ie. whether it is opened or not).

Class view.chatLog.ChatLogPanel extends JSplitPane implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

profile

String profile
profile describes the name of the currently used profile. It is used as one the arguments to extract chatlog data from database

model

Model model
model connects ChatLogPanel and the database functions.

logPane

JSplitPane logPane
logPane is a JSplitPane object that sets the right component of ChatLogWindow. It consists of datesScroll (on the top) and chatLog (on the bottom).

buddies

JList buddies
buddies is a JList object. It is the left component of ChatLogPanel. buddies shows the list of buddies whom the user has talked to.

datesScroll

JScrollPane datesScroll
datesScroll is a JScrollPane object. It is the scrollPane for dateList.

dateList

JList dateList
dateList is a JList that shows the dates of chat history. It shows the dates on dateVectorList.

text

JList text
text is a JList that shows the chat log. Developers note: text used to be a JEditorPane but the usage of it made the code inefficient. Right now, the code is efficient but the GUI looks bad. Please help me to consider which is better.

chatlog

JScrollPane chatlog
chatLog is a JScrollPane object. It is the scrollPane for text.

stub

String[] stub
stub is an array of String with one member. It used if there is no message to display on text.

Package view.mainwindow

Class view.mainwindow.GuestAccountFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

model

Model model
model stores the needed data of the system. It also connects it with database

core

MainController core
core is a MainController object. It helps the user to login.

mainFrame

MainWindow mainFrame
mainFrame is a MainWindow object which is a container of this panel.

popup

JFrame popup
popup is this JFrame object

mainPanel

SignInPanel mainPanel
mainPanel is a SignInPanel object. It sets the GUI component of MainWindow.

UNFieldGuest

JTextField UNFieldGuest
UNFieldGuest is a JTextField object. It is the text field for the user's username.

PwdFieldGuest

JPasswordField PwdFieldGuest
PwdFieldGuest is a JPasswordField object. It is the text field for the user's password.

server

JComboBox server
server is a JComboBox object. It shows the listed server the user can connect to.

status is a JLabel object that shows the system's status (ie. whether it is connected or not)

avatar is an ImageIcon object of the user's display picture

Class view.mainwindow.MiscPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Class view.mainwindow.SignInPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

core

MainController core
core is a MainController object. It helps the user to create a new profile and login using the existing account.

mainFrame

MainWindow mainFrame
mainFrame is a MainWindow object which is a container of this panel.

model

Model model
model stores the needed data of the system. It also connects it with database

account_select

JComboBox account_select
account_select is a JComboBox object. It shows the listed saved profiles

signin

SignInPanel signin
signin is this SignInPanel object. Used for some objects constructor argument.

header

HeaderPanel header
header is a HeaderPanel object which extends JPanel. It sets the top part of the MainWindow, which includes the avatar and the status of the system.

accPanel

JPanel accPanel
accPanel is a JPanel object. It sets the center part of the MainWindow, which includes account_select JComboBox, manageAccount LinkLabel, and guestAccount LinkLabel.

misc

MiscPanel misc
misc is a JPanel object. It sets the bottom part of the MainWindow, which includes a separator and help LinkLabel.

manageAccount

LinkLabel manageAccount
manageAccount is a LinkLabel object which will pop up ProfileManager when clicked

guestAccount

LinkLabel guestAccount
guestAccount is a LinkLabel object which will pop up GuestAccountFrame when clicked
